original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Faculties

original: 12.20. Saraṇaduka, Dassanenapahātabbadukādi🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nanadassanena pahātabbaṁ
analyzed: saraṇa duka dassanena apahātabba duka ādi  na saraṇam na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na na dassanena pahātabba
translated: The Chapter on the Pairs🔽The Pairs🔽The Section on the Pairs in the Chapter on the Pairs🔽With a non-object and not to be abandoned by seeing not as object …🔽With a non-object and not to be abandoned by development not as object …

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ🔽nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇa  na na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na dassanena pahātabba hetuka
translated: With a non-object and to be abandoned by development not as object …🔽With a non-object and having a cause that is not to be abandoned by seeing …

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…🔽nasaraṇaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca,
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam nana dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe  na saraṇam na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca
translated: With a non-object and having a cause that is not to be abandoned by development …🔽(In brief.) With respect to cause, five;

original: ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: with respect to object, two; … with respect to nutriment, one; … with respect to the unwholesome, five.

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a non-object and having a cause that is to be abandoned by development …

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽…pe… nasaraṇaṁ nasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe
analyzed: na saraṇam na sa vitakkam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na a vitakkam dhammam paṭicca  pe na saraṇam na sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe
translated: With a non-deceptive and not-thought-about …

original: ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ naavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nasappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽…pe… nasaraṇaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nanapītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ🔽paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nanasukhasahagataṁ
analyzed: ekam pe a vigate tīṇi  na saraṇam na avicāram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve  na saraṇam na sappītikam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na appītikam dhammam paṭicca  pe na saraṇam na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na na pīti sahagatam dhamma  paṭicca pe na saraṇam na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na na sukha sahagata
translated: With a non-deceptive and not-investigated …

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nanaupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: na saraṇam na na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve
translated: Dependent on a non-percipient mind element …

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nanakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca  na saraṇam na na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: Dependent on a non-percipient mind-consciousness element …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient fine-material-sphere mind element …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient fine-material-sphere mind-consciousness element …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient immaterial-sphere mind element …

original: Nasaraṇaṁ narūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nanarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽…pe… nasaraṇaṁ naarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe
analyzed: na saraṇam na rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca pe na saraṇam na na rūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca  pe na saraṇam na arūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe
translated: Dependent on a non-percipient immaterial-sphere mind-consciousness element …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient path mind element …

original: dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nanaarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca  na saraṇam na na a rūpa avacaram dhammam paṭicca
translated: Dependent on a non-percipient path mind-consciousness element …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient mind element that is an attainment …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient mind-consciousness element that is an attainment …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient mind element that is neither in the sensual realm nor in the fine-material realm …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient mind-consciousness element that is neither in the sensual realm nor in the fine-material realm …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient fine-material-sphere mind element that is neither in the sensual realm nor in the fine-material realm …

original: Nasaraṇaṁ napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na pariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca
translated: Dependent on a non-percipient fine-material-sphere mind-consciousness element that is neither in the sensual realm nor in the fine-material realm …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient immaterial-sphere mind element that is neither in the sensual realm nor in the fine-material realm …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient immaterial-sphere mind-consciousness element that is neither in the sensual realm nor in the fine-material realm …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient path mind element that is neither in the sensual realm nor in the fine-material realm …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient path mind-consciousness element that is neither in the sensual realm nor in the fine-material realm …🔽Dependent on a non-percipient mind element that is not included among those subject to cankers …

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naapariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na apariyāpannam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: With respect to an unprompted and unincluded … (Abbreviated.) … With respect to a cause, there are five; with respect to an object, there are two … With respect to nutriment, there is one … With respect to a condition, there are five.

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na niyyānikam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: With respect to an unprompted and not leading to going forth … (Abbreviated.) … With respect to a cause, there are five; with respect to an object, there are two … With respect to nutriment, there is one … With respect to a condition, there are five.

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naaniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na saraṇam na aniyyānikam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With respect to an unprompted and leading to going forth …

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na saraṇam na niyatam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: With respect to an unprompted and undetermined … (Abbreviated.) … With respect to a cause, there are five; with respect to an object, there are two … With respect to nutriment, there is one … With respect to a condition, there are five.

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nasaraṇaṁ nasauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Nasaraṇaṁ naanuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saraṇam na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca 🔽na saraṇam na sauttaram dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na sauttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā 🔽na saraṇam na anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With respect to an unprompted and not undetermined …🔽With respect to an unprompted and not supreme …🔽With respect to an unprompted and supreme …

original: Naaraṇaṁ naanuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Naaraṇaṁ naanuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na araṇam na anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā  na araṇam na anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: Dependent on a not-frightening, not-supreme Dhamma …

original: Naaraṇaṁ naanuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro ca naaraṇo naanuttaro ca🔽dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na araṇam na anuttaram dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ ca na araṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ ca  dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: Dependent on a not-frightening, not-supreme Dhamma …🔽Dependent on a not-frightening, not-supreme Dhamma …🔽Dependent on a not-frightening, not-supreme Dhamma …

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naanuttarañca naaraṇaṁ naanuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇam na anuttaram ca na araṇam na anuttaram ca dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: Dependent on a not-frightening, not-supreme Dhamma …🔽(In brief.)

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.🔽Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi🔽pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro  sahajāta vārampi paccaya vārampi nissaya vārampi sa saṭṭha vārampi sampayutta vārampi  pañhā vāram pi
translated: With respect to cause there are five, with respect to object two, … with respect to nutriment one, … with respect to faculty one, … with respect to path one, … with respect to condition five. (In all sections in detail.)

original: Dhammapaccanīye dukadukapaṭṭhānaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīye duka duka paṭṭhānam niṭṭhita
translated: The section on conascence, the section on relation, the section on support, the section on presence, the section on the aggregates, the section on the bases, and the section on the elements are to be given in detail in the same way as Concatenation.🔽The section on questions is to be given in detail in the same way as Concatenation.🔽The second pair of the section on the reverse order is finished.

original: Paccanīyapaṭṭhānaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: paccanīya paṭṭhānam niṭṭhita
translated: The section on the reverse order is finished.
